title.rendered: Days of Esplanade ‘štrukli’ at Le Bistro

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””]

[vc_column_text]Find a perfect comfort food for those cold winter days and indulge your taste buds with legendary, warm and tempting – Esplanade ‘štrukli’.

From 6th until 31st January 2022 Le Bistro treats you with a month of famous Esplanade Gourmet ‘štrukli’ at a special price of 120 kn (16 €*) for 2 portions.

Bon appétit!

 

Book your table

T.+385 1 45 666 11

lebistro@esplanade.hr[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
